book.title: My Young Master
book.description: 简介： This is the story of a master, told by his slave. As I sit now, after the flight of so many years, and gaze at the pictures in the firethe hills and the valleys of my boyhood, so bright, so glowingI am oppressed with the fear that my rude hand can bu...
